  This contract acts as a general purpose dispute creator.

changeLoserStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be paid by loser.

params._loserStakeMultiplier: The new loser multiplier value respect to MULTIPLIER_DIVISOR.

changeSharedStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be paid when there is no winner or loser.

params._sharedStakeMultiplier: The new tie multiplier value respect to MULTIPLIER_DIVISOR.

changeWinnerStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be paid by winner.

params._winnerStakeMultiplier: The new winner multiplier value respect to MULTIPLIER_DIVISOR.

params._arbitrator: Target global arbitrator for any disputes.
params._loserStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the arbitration cost that the loser has to pay as fee stake for a round in basis points.
params._sharedStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the arbitration cost that each party must pay as fee stake for a round when there isn't a winner/loser in the previous round (e.g. when it's the first round or the arbitrator refused to or did not rule). In basis points.
params._winnerStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the arbitration cost that the winner has to pay as fee stake for a round in basis points.

createDispute(bytes,string).details: TRUSTED. Calls createDispute function of the specified arbitrator to create a dispute. Note that we dont need to check that msg.value is enough to pay arbitration fees as its the responsibility of the arbitrator contract.

params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for the arbitrator of prospective dispute.
params._metaevidenceURI: Link to metaevidence of prospective dispute.

crowdfundingStatus(uint256,address).details: Returns crowdfunding status, useful for user interfaces.

params._localDisputeID: Dispute ID as in this contract.
params._participant: Address of crowdfunding participant to get details of.

returns.contributions: Contributions of given participant in the last round.
returns.feeRewards: Total fees collected for parties excluding appeal cost, in the last round.
returns.hasPaid: Whether given party paid required amount or not, for each party, in the last round.
returns.paidFees: Total fees paid for each party in the last round.

fundAppeal(uint256,uint8).details: TRUSTED. Manages contributions and calls appeal function of the specified arbitrator to appeal a dispute. This function lets appeals be crowdfunded. Note that we dont need to check that msg.value is enough to pay arbitration fees as its the responsibility of the arbitrator contract.

params._localDisputeID: Index of the dispute in disputes array.
params._side: The side to which the caller wants to contribute.

params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for arbitration cost calculation. See arbitrator for details.

returns.arbitrationFee: Arbitration cost of the arbitrator of this contract.

returns.hasMore: Whether the search was exhausted (has no more) or not (has more).
returns.openDisputes: Dispute identifiers of open disputes, as in arbitrator.

getRoundInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Gets the information of a round of a dispute.

returns.appealed: Whether the round is appealed or not.
returns.feeRewards: Total fees collected for parties excluding appeal cost.
returns.hasPaid: Whether given party paid required amount or not, for each party.
returns.paidFees: Total fees paid for each party.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: To be called by the arbitrator of the dispute, to declare winning side.

params._externalDisputeID: ID of the dispute in arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: The ruling choice of the arbitration.

submitEvidence(uint256,string).details: Allows to submit evidence for a given dispute.

params._localDisputeID: Index of the dispute in disputes array.

withdrawFeesAndRewards(uint256,address,u.details: Allows to withdraw any reimbursable fees or rewards after the dispute gets solved.

params._contributor: The address to withdraw its rewards.
params._localDisputeID: Index of the dispute in disputes array.
params._roundNumber: The number of the round caller wants to withdraw from.

withdrawFeesAndRewardsForAllRounds(uint2.details: Allows to withdraw any rewards or reimbursable fees after the dispute gets resolved, for all rounds.

params._contributor: The address to withdraw its rewards.
params._localDisputeID: Index of the dispute in disputes array.

devdoc.title: BinaryArbitrableProxy  This contract acts as a general purpose dispute creator.
